mapper.sql: ID, PRODUCTIVE_PART_CODE, PRODUCTIVE_PART_NAME, SPARE_PART_CODE, SPARE_PART_NAME, IS_SPARE_PART, UNIT, DEPARTMENT, RESPONSIBLE_ENGINEER, SUPPLIER, CODE, PURCHASING_ENGINEER, REMARK, PART_CLASS, WORKSHOP1, WORKSHOP2, PART_LEVEL, MAJOR, HIERARCHY, ADS, REL_EBOM_LINE_ID, RESERVED1, RESERVED2, RESERVED3, RESERVED4, RESERVED5
mapper.select: select count(*) from SPARE_PART_DATA t LEFT JOIN SPARE_PART_OF_PROJECT tx ON t.ID = tx.SPARE_PART_ID WHERE tx.PROJECT_ID = #{projectId}
mapper.insert:
select SEQ_SPARE_PART_ID.Nextval from dual
insert into SPARE_PART_DATA (ID, PRODUCTIVE_PART_CODE, PRODUCTIVE_PART_NAME, SPARE_PART_CODE, SPARE_PART_NAME, IS_SPARE_PART, UNIT, DEPARTMENT, RESPONSIBLE_ENGINEER, SUPPLIER, CODE, PURCHASING_ENGINEER, REMARK, PART_CLASS, WORKSHOP1, WORKSHOP2, PART_LEVEL, MAJOR, HIERARCHY, ADS, REL_EBOM_LINE_ID, RESERVED1, RESERVED2, RESERVED3, RESERVED4, RESERVED5) values (#{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{productivePartCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{productivePartName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sparePartCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sparePartName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isSparePart,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{department,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{responsibleEngineer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{supplier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{purchasingEngineer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{partClass,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{workshop1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{workshop2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{level,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{major,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hierarchy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ads,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{relEbomLineId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reserved1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reserved2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reserved3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reserved4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reserved5,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update SPARE_PART_DATA
PRODUCTIVE_PART_CODE = #{productivePartCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRODUCTIVE_PART_NAME = #{productivePartName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SPARE_PART_CODE = #{sparePartCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SPARE_PART_NAME = #{sparePartName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IS_SPARE_PART = #{isSparePart,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
UNIT = #{unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DEPARTMENT = #{department,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RESPONSIBLE_ENGINEER = #{responsibleEngineer,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SUPPLIER = #{supplier,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CODE = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PURCHASING_ENGINEER = #{purchasingEngineer,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PART_CLASS = #{partClass,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WORKSHOP1 = #{workshop1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WORKSHOP2 = #{workshop2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PART_LEVEL= #{level,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MAJOR = #{major,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
HIERARCHY = #{hierarchy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ADS = #{ads,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REL_EBOM_LINE_ID = #{relEbomLineId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RESERVED1 = #{reserved1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RESERVED2 = #{reserved2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RESERVED3 = #{reserved3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RESERVED4 = #{reserved4,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RESERVED5 = #{reserved5,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update SPARE_PART_DATA set PRODUCTIVE_PART_CODE = #{productivePartCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRODUCTIVE_PART_NAME = #{productivePartName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SPARE_PART_CODE = #{sparePartCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SPARE_PART_NAME = #{sparePartName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IS_SPARE_PART = #{isSparePart,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, UNIT = #{unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEPARTMENT = #{department,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RESPONSIBLE_ENGINEER = #{responsibleEngineer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SUPPLIER = #{supplier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CODE = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PURCHASING_ENGINEER = #{purchasingEngineer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PART_CLASS = #{partClass,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WORKSHOP1 = #{workshop1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WORKSHOP2 = #{workshop2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PART_LEVEL = #{level,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MAJOR = #{major,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, HIERARCHY = #{hierarchy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ADS = #{ads,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REL_EBOM_LINE_ID = #{relEbomLineId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RESERVED1 = #{reserved1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RESERVED2 = #{reserved2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RESERVED3 = #{reserved3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RESERVED4 = #{reserved4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RESERVED5 = #{reserved5,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
